75098.summary: Some customers in the Kerrisdale, Shaughnessy, West Side & West End areas of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
75098.title: Apr 9 - Vancouver (Kerrisdale, Shaughnessy, West Side & West End) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

75160.title: Apr 10 - Calgary (Beltline) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
